https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4RtWkqywkzxonlnGBwv4RpSw4Rb.jpg Shuhei Hirayama is a widower with a 24-year-old daughter. Gradually, he comes to realize that she should not be obliged to look after him for the rest of his life, so he arranges a marriage for her. An Autumn Afternoon
